thread.section_title: B2C Jewels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B2C Jewels | www.b2cjewels.com
thread.title: Fred

author: Fred
title: Fred
text: I'd like to thank Simon, Shane, Rio, Melwin, and the rest of the B2C Jewels team for making my experience pain-free. They provided me with great service, offering objective opinions of diamonds that I was considering, emailing me images of diamonds, and suggesting diamonds similar to what I was in the market for. Most importantly, they didn't go for the hard sell, yet they helped me maximize and get excellent bang for my buck. I am thrilled to say that the diamond I purchased was appraised for more than I bought it for. So I am extremely happy with my decision to buy online and from B2C.
